message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $700000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $750000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $725000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand that you're still a bit short on budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $735000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $720000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $730000. This is as low as I'm willing to go.

I understand that you're getting close to your minimum acceptable price, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $715000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
I'm getting close to my limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $725000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $710000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
